pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Hayfever Blend 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hay Fever Ease with Lemon, Peppermint, Grapefruit & Lavender essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to assist in easing the symptoms of Hay Fever.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Application to skin may cause sensitivity to sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.
Not to be taken.
Not to be used neat.
Store below 30°C.
Do not use if seal is around lid is damaged.

Common Uses

Hay Fever Ease with Lemon, Peppermint, Grapefruit & Lavender essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to assist in easing the symptoms of Hay Fever.
 To assist in the management of the follwing Hay Fever symptoms:
• Upper Respiratory Congestion
• Nasal Secretions
• Headaches
• Catarrh

Ingredients

Lemon Oil (Citrus limon), Peppermint Oil (Mentha X piperita), Grapefruit Oil (Citrus X paradisi), Lavender Oil (Lavandula angustifolia), Blue Cypress Oil (Callitris intratropica)

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day):
Vaporisation: Add up to 6 drops (0.3mL) to the water in your vaporiser.
Massage: Add 5 drops (0.2mL) to 10mL carrier oil and massage into chest and back. The mixture can be kept for 24 hours at room temperature.
